top_places.title: Amalfi
top_places.description: The ultimate Amalfi Coast travel guide, where to stay, where to eat, and what areas to visit in the Amalfi Coast of Italy.

top_places.title: Granada
top_places.description: Granada is the capital city of the province of Granada, in the autonomous community of Andalusia, Spain.

top_places.title: Cherry blossoms
top_places.description: Cherry blossoms usually bloom between mid-March and early May. In 2022, Tokyo's cherry blossom season officially began on March 20.

places.title: Cappadocia
places.description: Cappadocia's landscape includes dramatic expanses of soft volcanic rock, shaped by erosion into towers, cones, valleys, and caves.

places.title: Capri
places.description: Capri is an island of a thousand faces, where visitors can walk the trails skirting the cliffs above the Mediterranean.

places.title: Bora Bora
places.description: Learn how you can travel Bora Bora on a budget and how overwater bungalows are possible for cheap.

places.title: Phuket
places.description: Phuket is the largest island in Thailand, located in the Andaman Sea in southern Thailand.

places.title: gunung gede
places.description: Gunung gede adalah gunung terbesar, Berlokasi di Indonesia.
